participant_1.background: i have never been out of ohio. i work for our local supermarket. my favorite band is the who. i've a cat named spook. my favorite food is pizza with black olives.

participant_2.background: i walk dogs for a living. i'm also a graduate student. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills.

content.text: i walk dogs for a living. and what do you like to do?
